titleStmt.title: A paradox against liberty written by the Lords, during their imprisonment in the Tower a poem.
titleStmt.author: Shaftesbury, Anthony Ashley Cooper, Earl of, 1621-1683.
Buckingham, George Villiers, Duke of, 1628-1687.
Salisbury, James Cecil, Earl of, d. 1683.
Wharton, Philip Wharton, Baron, 1613-1696.

notesStmt.note: The Lords are Shaftesbury, Buckingham, Salisbury, Wharton.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
